net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock
Class ProbeBlock

java.lang.Object
  net.java.jddac.common.fblock.Entity
      net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock.FunctionBlock
          net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock.GenericStoreBlock
              net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock.GenericArgArrayStoreBlock
                  net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock.GaasPubBlock
                      net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock.ProbeBlock
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigurationInterface, SubscriberCallback
public class ProbeBlock
extends GaasPubBlock
implements SubscriberCallback

An implementation of the GenericArgArrayStoreBlock that stores a probe in each record. The parent table is the user table.

See Also:
UserBlock, GenericArgArrayStoreBlock

Method Detail

configure

public void configure(ArgArray configuration)
               throws java.lang.Exception
Description copied from interface: ConfigurationInterface
Provides a method to configure object properties. The registry argument contains an ArgArray composed named values. Any values that are not specified are assumed to be left unchanged. That is, if a value is not present, do not assume it means 0 or true or some other default. This allows the configure method to be used to set a single value without affecting other values.

Specified by:
configure in interface ConfigurationInterface
Overrides:
configure in class GaasPubBlock
Parameters:
configuration - contains incoming configuration parameters as named values.

Name Default Description
db   The DbConMgrBlock to use to get a Connection to the database.
tableName   The base database table name.
parentTableName   The parents base database table name. Only used for the getAllByParentAttr function.
storeClass GenericStore The delegate class to use for accessing the database.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
See Also:
ConfigurationInterface.configure(net.java.jddac.common.type.ArgArray)

notifySubscriber

public void notifySubscriber(short publication_id,
                             java.lang.String publicationTopic,
                             ArgArray inArgs)
                      throws OpException
Description copied from class: FunctionBlock
required method for SubscriberCallback. This method is provided so that sub-classes do not need to do anything if they want to ignore publications. Typically, a class which inherits from FunctionBlock will override this method with its own.

Specified by:
notifySubscriber in interface SubscriberCallback
Overrides:
notifySubscriber in class FunctionBlock
Parameters:
publication_id - The ID which was passed into the SubscriberPort when subscribing to topic
publicationTopic - The topic that the publication was published on.
inArgs - The payload which was published.
Throws:
OpException

updateDatabase

public long updateDatabase(JddacId from)
Looks update a probe using its JddacId, if not found creates a probe record, and returns the probe's database ID.

Parameters:
from - the JddacId of the probe to update/lookup.
Returns:
the database probe ID

getMeasurementCount

public long getMeasurementCount(long pid)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
Returns the number of measurements stored for a probe.

Parameters:
pid - - the probe database ID.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - - if a database access error occurs

getGroupsProbes

public ArgArray getGroupsProbes(java.lang.String gid)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
Get an ArgArray of all probes that have a specified UserBlock.ORG_GROUP attribute. The returned ArgArray contains an element for each matching probe where the key is the probe name and the value is the probe's database ID.

Parameters:
gid - - the UserBlock.ORG_GROUP.
Returns:
an ArgArray of matching probes.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - - if a database access error occurs

getProbeList

public java.util.TreeMap getProbeList(long uid)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
Return a TreeMap of all probes a specified user is allowed to view. The returned TreeMap contains an element for each probe where the key is the probe's display name and the value is the probe's database ID.

Parameters:
uid - - user database ID.
Returns:
a TreeMap of probes.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - - if a database access error occurs

public java.lang.String getProbeDisplayName(long pid)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
Returns a user interface friendly name for a probe.

Parameters:

Returns:
the display name for the probe.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - - if a database access error occurs

getProbeDisplayName

public java.lang.String getProbeDisplayName(long pid,
                                            ArgArray config)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
Returns a user interface friendly name for a probe. If the probe type configuration has a shortNameCond entry that can be used, the result will be the probe's owners user name combined with the result of the shortNameCond. Otherwise the result will be computed from the probe's JddacId.

Parameters:
pid - - a probes databased ID.
config - - the probe type configuration for the probe.
Returns:
the display name for the probe.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - - if a database access error occurs
